mapper.update:
update sm_print_label
receipt_body_id = #{receiptBodyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
location_no = #{locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sm_print_label set receipt_body_id = #{receiptBodyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, location_no = #{locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sm_print_label where package_id like #{no,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' order by print_label_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into sm_print_label (print_label_id, receipt_body_id, package_id, produce_date, produce_batch, num, origin, `type`, `status`, location_no, relate_label_id, relate_package_id, create_time, dr) values
(#{po.printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.receiptBodyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.produceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{po.produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select pl.print_label_id as printLabelId, pl.package_id as packageId, m.material_no as materialNo, m.material_desc as materialDesc, pl.num from sm_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_body rb on pl.receipt_body_id = rb.receipt_body_id left join sm_material m on rb.material_no = m.material_no where pl.receipt_body_id = #{rbid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.package_id = #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR} and pl.dr = 1 and pl.`status` = 3
